dcterms:description: The ISLES 2015 dataset is a public evaluation benchmark for ischemic stroke lesion segmentation from multi-spectral MRI, containing images of 28 volumes that are skull stripped and re-sampled to an isotropic spacing of 1mm3.
dcterms:title: ISLES

dcterms:description: The BraTS dataset is a multimodal brain tumor image segmentation benchmark that includes FLAIR data from MRI scans of glioblastoma, containing images of 79 volumes that are skull-striped and interpolated to 1mm3 resolution.
dcterms:title: BraTS
